concept.definition: An author of the content of the module
An editor of the content of the module
A reviewer of the content of the module
An endorser of the content of the module

text.div:
ModuleMetadataContributorType

The type of contributor

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/module-metadata-contributor defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
author AuthorAn author of the content of the module
editor EditorAn editor of the content of the module
reviewer ReviewerA reviewer of the content of the module
endorser EndorserAn endorser of the content of the module
